CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, pg. A12, reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' ... 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Alma Speed Fox standing, and Evelyn Anderson seated, both wearing two piece dance costumes with ruffles around sleeves and skirt, posed in interior with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboards for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Dance costume--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Fox, Alma Speed.Anderson, Evelyn.
